ps2.9:2.2: saddhabalam, viriyabalam, satibalam, samadhibalam, pannabalam, hiribalam, ottappabalam, patisankhanabalam, bhavanabalam, anavajjabalam, sangahabalam, khantibalam, pannattibalam, nijjhattibalam, issariyabalam, adhitthanabalam, samathabalam, vipassanabalam, dasa sekhabalani, dasa asekhabalani, dasa khinasavabalani, dasa iddhibalani, dasa tathagatabalani”.
ps2.9:3.3: Sahajatanam dhammanam upatthambhanatthena saddhabalam, kilesanam pariyadanatthena saddhabalam, pativedhadivisodhanatthena saddhabalam, cittassa adhitthanatthena saddhabalam, cittassa vodanatthena saddhabalam, visesadhigamatthena saddhabalam, uttaripativedhatthena saddhabalam, saccabhisamayatthena saddhabalam, nirodhe patitthapakatthena saddhabalam.
ps2.9:4.3: Sahajatanam dhammanam upatthambhanatthena viriyabalam, kilesanam pariyadanatthena viriyabalam, pativedhadivisodhanatthena viriyabalam, cittassa adhitthanatthena viriyabalam, cittassa vodanatthena viriyabalam, visesadhigamatthena viriyabalam, uttaripativedhatthena viriyabalam, saccabhisamayatthena viriyabalam, nirodhe patitthapakatthena viriyabalam.
ps2.9:11.9: Nivarane pajahanto pathamam jhanam bhavetiti— bhavanabalam …pe…
ps2.9:12.2: Kamacchandassa pahinatta nekkhamme natthi kinci vajjanti—anavajjabalam.
ps2.9:12.3: Byapadassa pahinatta abyapade natthi kinci vajjanti—anavajjabalam.
ps2.9:12.4: Thinamiddhassa pahinatta alokasannaya natthi kinci vajjanti—anavajjabalam.
ps2.9:12.5: Uddhaccassa pahinatta avikkhepe natthi kinci vajjanti—anavajjabalam.
ps2.9:12.6: Vicikicchaya pahinatta dhammavavatthane natthi kinci vajjanti—anavajjabalam.
ps2.9:12.7: Avijjaya pahinatta nane natthi kinci vajjanti—anavajjabalam.
ps2.9:12.8: Aratiya pahinatta pamojje natthi kinci vajjanti anavajjabalam.
ps2.9:12.9: Nivarananam pahinatta pathamajjhane natthi kinci vajjanti—anavajjabalam …pe…
ps2.9:12.10: sabbakilesanam pahinatta arahattamagge natthi kinci vajjanti—anavajjabalam.
ps2.9:14.9: Nivarananam pahinatta pathamam jhanam khamatiti— khantibalam …pe…
ps2.9:16.4: Thinamiddham pajahanto alokasannavasena cittam nijjhapetiti— nijjhattibalam …pe…
ps2.9:17.2: Kamacchandam pajahanto nekkhammavasena cittam vasam vattetiti—issariyabalam.
ps2.9:17.3: Byapadam pajahanto abyapadavasena cittam vasam vattetiti—issariyabalam.
ps2.9:17.4: Thinamiddham pajahanto alokasannavasena cittam vasam vattetiti— issariyabalam …pe…
ps2.9:17.5: sabbakilese pajahanto arahattamaggavasena cittam vasam vattetiti—issariyabalam.
ps2.9:18.4: Thinamiddham pajahanto alokasannavasena cittam adhitthatiti— adhitthanabalam …pe…
ps2.9:19.2: Nekkhammavasena cittassa ekaggata avikkhepo samathabalam, abyapadavasena cittassa ekaggata avikkhepo samathabalam, alokasannavasena cittassa ekaggata avikkhepo samathabalam …pe…
ps2.9:19.3: patinissagganupassi assasavasena cittassa ekaggata avikkhepo samathabalam, patinissagganupassi passasavasena cittassa ekaggata avikkhepo samathabalam.
ps2.9:20.2: Pathamena jhanena nivarane na kampatiti— samathabalam.
ps2.9:20.6: Akasanancayatanasamapattiya rupasannaya patighasannaya nanattasannaya na kampatiti—samathabalam.
ps2.9:20.10: Uddhacce ca uddhaccasahagatakilese ca khandhe ca na kampati na calati na vedhatiti—samathabalam.
ps2.9:21.3: patinissagganupassana vipassanabalam, rupe aniccanupassana vipassanabalam, rupe dukkhanupassana vipassanabalam …pe…
ps2.9:21.9: jaramarane aniccanupassana vipassanabalam, jaramarane dukkhanupassana vipassanabalam …pe…
ps2.9:21.19: Avijjaya ca avijjasahagatakilese ca khandhe ca na kampati na calati na vedhatiti— vipassanabalam.
ps2.9:23.2: Idha khinasavassa bhikkhuno aniccato sabbe sankhara yathabhutam sammappannaya sudittha honti.
ps2.9:23.3: Yampi khinasavassa bhikkhuno aniccato sabbe sankhara yathabhutam sammappannaya sudittha honti, idampi khinasavassa bhikkhuno balam hoti, yam balam agamma khinasavo bhikkhu asavanam khayam patijanati—“khina me asava”ti.
ps2.9:24.1: Puna caparam khinasavassa bhikkhuno angarakasupama kama yathabhutam sammappannaya sudittha honti.
ps2.9:24.2: Yampi khinasavassa bhikkhuno angarakasupama kama yathabhutam sammappannaya sudittha honti, idampi khinasavassa bhikkhuno balam hoti, yam balam agamma khinasavo bhikkhu asavanam khayam patijanati—“khina me asava”ti.
ps2.9:25.1: Puna caparam khinasavassa bhikkhuno vivekaninnam cittam hoti vivekaponam vivekapabbharam vivekattham nekkhammabhiratam byantibhutam sabbaso asavatthaniyehi dhammehi.
ps2.9:25.2: Yampi khinasavassa bhikkhuno vivekaninnam cittam hoti vivekaponam vivekapabbharam vivekattham nekkhammabhiratam byantibhutam sabbaso asavatthaniyehi dhammehi, idampi khinasavassa bhikkhuno balam hoti, yam balam agamma khinasavo bhikkhu asavanam khayam patijanati—“khina me asava”ti.
ps2.9:26.1: Puna caparam khinasavassa bhikkhuno cattaro satipatthana bhavita honti subhavita.
ps2.9:26.2: Yampi khinasavassa bhikkhuno cattaro satipatthana bhavita honti subhavita, idampi khinasavassa bhikkhuno balam hoti, yam balam agamma khinasavo bhikkhu asavanam khayam patijanati—“khina me asava”ti.
ps2.9:27.1: Puna caparam khinasavassa bhikkhuno cattaro sammappadhana bhavita honti subhavita …pe…
ps2.9:27.6: ariyo atthangiko maggo bhavito hoti subhavito.
ps2.9:27.7: Yampi khinasavassa bhikkhuno atthangiko maggo bhavito hoti subhavito, idampi khinasavassa bhikkhuno balam hoti, yam balam agamma khinasavo bhikkhu asavanam khayam patijanati—“khina me asava”ti.
ps2.9:28.2: Adhitthana iddhi, vikubbana iddhi, manomaya iddhi, nanavipphara iddhi, samadhivipphara iddhi, ariya iddhi, kammavipakaja iddhi, punnavato iddhi, vijjamaya iddhi, tattha tattha samma payogappaccaya ijjhanatthena iddhi—
ps2.9:29.2: Idha tathagato thananca thanato atthananca atthanato yathabhutam pajanati.
ps2.9:29.3: Yampi tathagato thananca thanato atthananca atthanato yathabhutam pajanati, idampi tathagatassa tathagatabalam hoti, yam balam agamma tathagato asabham thanam patijanati parisasu sihanadam nadati, brahmacakkam pavatteti.
ps2.9:30.1: Puna caparam tathagato atitanagatapaccuppannanam kammasamadananam thanaso hetuso vipakam yathabhutam pajanati.
ps2.9:30.2: Yampi tathagato atitanagatapaccuppannanam kammasamadananam thanaso hetuso vipakam yathabhutam pajanati, idampi tathagatassa tathagatabalam hoti, yam balam agamma tathagato asabham thanam patijanati, parisasu sihanadam, nadati, brahmacakkam pavatteti.
ps2.9:31.1: Puna caparam tathagato sabbatthagaminim patipadam yathabhutam pajanati.
ps2.9:31.2: Yampi tathagato sabbatthagaminim patipadam yathabhutam pajanati, idampi tathagatassa tathagatabalam hoti, yam balam agamma tathagato asabham thanam patijanati, parisasu sihanadam nadati, brahmacakkam pavatteti.
ps2.9:32.1: Puna caparam tathagato anekadhatum nanadhatum lokam yathabhutam pajanati.
ps2.9:32.2: Yampi tathagato anekadhatum nanadhatum lokam yathabhutam pajanati, idampi tathagatassa …pe….
ps2.9:33.1: Puna caparam tathagato sattanam nanadhimuttikatam yathabhutam pajanati.
ps2.9:33.2: Yampi tathagato sattanam nanadhimuttikatam yathabhutam pajanati, idampi tathagatassa …pe….
ps2.9:34.1: Puna caparam tathagato parasattanam parapuggalanam indriyaparopariyattam yathabhutam pajanati.
ps2.9:34.2: Yampi tathagato parasattanam parapuggalanam indriyaparopariyattam yathabhutam pajanati, idampi tathagatassa …pe….
ps2.9:35.1: Puna caparam tathagato jhanavimokkhasamadhisamapattinam sankilesam vodanam vutthanam yathabhutam pajanati.
ps2.9:35.2: Yampi tathagato jhanavimokkhasamadhisamapattinam sankilesam vodanam vutthanam yathabhutam pajanati, idampi tathagatassa …pe….
ps2.9:36.1: Puna caparam tathagato anekavihitam pubbenivasam anussarati, seyyathidam—
ps2.9:36.3: iti sakaram sauddesam anekavihitam pubbenivasam anussarati.
ps2.9:37.1: Puna caparam tathagato dibbena cakkhuna visuddhena atikkantamanusakena satte passati cavamane upapajjamane …pe…
ps2.9:37.2: yampi tathagato dibbena cakkhuna visuddhena atikkantamanusakena satte passati cavamane upapajjamane …pe…
ps2.9:38.1: Puna caparam tathagato asavanam khaya anasavam cetovimuttim pannavimuttim dittheva dhamme sayam abhinna sacchikatva upasampajja viharati.
ps2.9:38.2: Yampi tathagato asavanam khaya anasavam cetovimuttim pannavimuttim dittheva dhamme sayam abhinna sacchikatva upasampajja viharati, idampi tathagatassa tathagatabalam hoti, yam balam agamma tathagato asabham thanam patijanati, parisasu sihanadam nadati, brahmacakkam pavatteti.
ps2.9:40.9: Tattha jata dhamma ekarasa hontiti— bhavanabalam.
